ai.summary: A short, easy 1-kilometer hike along the Illogan FP 24 footpath in the UK, suitable for beginners. The route provides a gentle walk with minimal elevation and light scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-defined path with occasional muddy patches after rain; some sections may be narrow and require careful footing.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths at all times. Wear sturdy waterproof footwear and bring a light rain jacket. Check the day’s weather and daylight hours before setting out. Carry water and a small first-aid kit. Be aware of other walkers and local riders, and respect landowner access rules.
ai.best_seasons: All year, with spring and autumn offering mild weather and pleasant scenery. Summer can be warm but sunny; winter may bring mud and reduced daylight.

seo.title: Illogan FP 24 – Easy 1 km UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Discover Illogan FP 24, an easy 1 km hike in the UK. Learn safety tips, gear recommendations, and the best seasons for this short footpath.
